description: The military said the three men were shot and killed by troops who were operating in northern Gaza.
maintext: He lived in the town of Hura and worked at a chicken hatchery in the kibbutz. On the morning of 7 October, he was at work. He called his sister after the attack to tell her that he had been injured by gunfire.
title: Israel hostages: IDF says it mistakenly killed three men held in Gaza
